original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s not being discouraged by the immensity of saṃsāra?

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar @355a *//
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar @355a *//
translated: It is the teaching of roots of virtue

original: bstan na / sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston cing /
analyzed: bstan na / sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston cing /
translated: that will ripen sentient beings and purify a buddhafield.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du /
translated: Until omniscience is complete,

original: nam yang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni /
analyzed: nam yang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni /
translated: one is never discouraged.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s not being discouraged by the immensity of saṃsāra.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s abiding in shame and conscience?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste /
translated: condemning the thought of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s patience and tolerance.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s not abandoning the ascetic practices?

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' ba ste /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' ba ste /
translated: It is transcending the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s not abandoning the ascetic practices.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s having few desires?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub la'ang 'dod pa mi skyed pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub la'ang 'dod pa mi skyed pa ste /
translated: It is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva not even desiring enlightenment.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s having few desires.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog @355b shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog @355b shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s being content?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa ste /
translated: Even when they attain omniscience, they do not become conceited.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ contentment.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom ba mi gtang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom ba mi gtang ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva great beings’ not giving up the ascetic virtues?

original: 'di ltar chos zab mo rnams la rtogs par gzhog pa'i bzod pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos zab mo rnams la rtogs par gzhog pa'i bzod pa ste /
translated: It is the acceptance of the profound Dharma.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi gtang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi gtang ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ not giving up the ascetic virtues.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva great beings’ not giving up the training?

original: bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste /
analyzed: bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste /
translated: It is the non-movement of all the trainings.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ not giving up the training.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ contempt for the pleasures of the senses consist in?

original: 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed pa ste /
translated: It is the absence of any thought of desire.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ contempt for the pleasures of the senses.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ mental state of transcendence consist in?

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste /
translated: It is the non-conditioning of all phenomena.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ mental state of transcendence.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su gtang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su gtang ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ complete giving of all substances consist in?

original: phyi @356a *// nang gi chos thams cad la 'dzin pa med pa ste /
analyzed: phyi @356a *// nang gi chos thams cad la 'dzin pa med pa ste /
translated: It is the absence of grasping at any inner or outer phenomena.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su gtang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su gtang ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s giving away of all possessions.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa gang zhe na /🔽rnam par shes pa gnas pa la /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa gang zhe na / rnam par shes pa gnas pa la /
translated: “What, you ask, is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s absence of mental lassitude?

original: de'i sems mi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de'i sems mi gnas pa ste /
translated: It is the non-abiding of the mind in the abodes of consciousness.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s absence of mental lassitude.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la bltos pa med pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la bltos pa med pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you ask, is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s lack of concern for all things?

original: dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste /
translated: It is the non-attention to all things.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la bltos pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la bltos pa med pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s lack of concern for all things.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you ask, is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s avoidance of associating with householders?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing brdzus te skye ba dang / mgo bregs shing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing brdzus te skye ba dang / mgo bregs shing /
translated: They will be reborn miraculously, passing from one buddha realm to another, their heads shaved.

original: ngur smrig gi gos bgo ba ste /
analyzed: ngur smrig gi gos bgo ba ste /
translated: They are born miraculously in the buddhafields, and they shave their heads and put on the orange robes.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ avoidance of associating with householders.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva great beings’ avoidance of associating with nuns?

original: dge slong ma dang se gol gtogs pa tsam du'ang lhan cig mi gnas shing /
analyzed: dge slong ma dang se gol gtogs pa tsam du'ang lhan cig mi gnas shing /
translated: They do not stay with nuns even for as long as it takes to snap one’s fingers,

original: de'i rgyus yongs su skom pa'i sems mi skyed de /
analyzed: de'i rgyus yongs su skom pa'i sems mi skyed de /
translated: and they do not arouse a lustful mind on that basis.

original: de'i rgyus gos 'thob par mi byed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de'i rgyus gos 'thob par mi byed pa 'di ni /
translated: They do not get robes on that basis.

original: byang @356b chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang @356b chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ avoidance of associating with nuns.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s avoidance of stinginess about the family?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste /
translated: Subhūti, here the bodhisattva-mahāsattva should think like this:

original: gang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa sgrub par bya ba de dang / sems can 'di dag rang rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur na /
analyzed: gang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa sgrub par bya ba de dang / sems can 'di dag rang rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur na /
translated: ‘I should accomplish the aspect of happiness for all sentient beings, and if these sentient beings are happy through their own merit,

original: de la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni /
analyzed: de la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni /
translated: I should not give rise to a stingy mind.’

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s avoidance of stinginess about the family.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s avoidance of dwelling in a place of crowds?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas /
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattva should not dwell in a place of crowds where

original: nyan thos sam /
analyzed: nyan thos sam /
translated: nor śrāvakas,

original: rang sangs rgyas yod pa'am /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas yod pa'am /
translated: nor pratyekabuddhas,

original: de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: nor the talk of those who have them,

original: de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas par mi bya ste /
translated: nor the arousing of the thought of those who have them.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ avoidance of crowded places.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva great beings’ avoidance of malice?

original: gnod sems dang / 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed @357a *//
analyzed: gnod sems dang / 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed @357a *//
translated: They do not give an opportunity to malice or a harmful mind,🔽nor do they give an opportunity to a mind of fighting

original: cing; 'thab mo'i sems sam /🔽rtsod pa'i sems kyi go mi 'byed pa ste /
analyzed: cing; 'thab mo'i sems sam / rtsod pa'i sems kyi go mi 'byed pa ste /
translated: or a mind of quarreling.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ avoidance of malice.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s avoidance of praising oneself?

original: nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
translated: It is not seeing inner dharmas.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s avoidance of praising oneself.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spong ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spong ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s avoidance of disparaging others?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
translated: not seeing outer dharmas.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s avoidance of disparaging others.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s avoidance of the ten unwholesome courses of action?🔽They are as follows:

original: de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la'ang bar du gcod na /
analyzed: de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la'ang bar du gcod na /
translated: since they are an obstacle even to a good rebirth,

original: 'phags pa'i lam la lta ci smos te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam la lta ci smos te /
translated: what need is there to mention the noble path?

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la lta smos kyang ci dgos kyi /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la lta smos kyang ci dgos kyi /
translated: how much more so for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening!

original: spang bar bya'o zhes sbyong ba ste /
analyzed: spang bar bya'o zhes sbyong ba ste /
translated: They should be abandoned.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ abandonment of the ten unwholesome actions.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya @357b ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya @357b ba yin zhe na /
translated: “What, you may ask, is the bodhisattva great beings’ abandonment of excessive pride?

original: de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med na /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med na /
translated: It is this: since they do not see any dharma at all,

original: gang gi nga rgyal du 'gyur ba'i lhag pa lta ci smos zhes nga rgyal du mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi nga rgyal du 'gyur ba'i lhag pa lta ci smos zhes nga rgyal du mi byed pa ste /
translated: how much less so would they have any excessive pride in anything!

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ abandonment of excessive pride.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na; de ni 'di ltar des gang la khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na; de ni 'di ltar des gang la khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ complete rejection of conceit consist in? It is the fact that they do not see any entity whatsoever that could give rise to conceit.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ complete rejection of conceit.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ complete rejection of mistakenness consist in?

original: dngos por mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: dngos por mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: It is the fact that they do not apprehend anything as an entity.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ complete rejection of mistakenness.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba yin zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and great spiritual heroes’ not giving up on desire, anger, and ignorance consist in?

original: de ni 'di ltar des 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar des 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
translated: It is because they do not see desire, anger, and ignorance.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ not giving up desire, anger, and ignorance.

original: de la sa drug la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sa drug la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What are the six dharmas that are to be completed on the six stages?

original: 'di ltar pha @358a *//🔽rol tu phyin pa drug ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar pha @358a *// rol tu phyin pa drug ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste /
translated: the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas te /
translated: It is because, standing in these six perfections,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams shes par bya ba'i rgya mtsho lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams shes par bya ba'i rgya mtsho lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to //
translated: The Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, the Śrāvakas, and the Pratyekabuddhas have gone beyond the five great oceans of knowledge,

original: phyin to // phyin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyin to // phyin par 'gyur ro //
translated: have gone beyond, will go beyond,

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are:

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / brjod du med pa dang / 'dus ma byas te /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / brjod du med pa dang / 'dus ma byas te /
translated: the past, the future, the present, the inexpressible, and the unconditioned.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: Thus should the Bodhisattva, the Great Being, perfect the six perfections.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: How, Subhūti, should the Bodhisattva, the Great Being, abandon the six dharmas?

original: 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas /
translated: Because they are not the path to enlightenment,

original: nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o //
translated: he should abandon the Śrāvaka thought.

original: 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas /
translated: Because they are not the path to enlightenment,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o; ;'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas srid pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o; ;'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas srid pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o //
translated: One should abandon the thought of a pratyekabuddha, because that is not the path to awakening.

original: 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas /
translated: One should abandon the thought of the world, because that is not the path to awakening.🔽One should not be discouraged when seeing a beggar.

original: slong mo pa mthong na sems zhum @358b pa mi bskyed do //🔽'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas /
analyzed: slong mo pa mthong na sems zhum @358b pa mi bskyed do // 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas /
translated: One should not be discouraged when giving to a beggar.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away all one’s possessions.

original: dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya'o //🔽'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas; thog ma sems bskyed nas /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya'o // 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas; thog ma sems bskyed nas /
translated: One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s wife and children.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s eyes.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s flesh, skin, and blood.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s hands and feet.

original: kha za yag gi sems su mi bya'i /
analyzed: kha za yag gi sems su mi bya'i /
translated: One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s head.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s kingdom.

original: sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s wealth.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s elephants, horses, chariots, and carriages.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s male and female servants.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s oxen.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s sheep.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s fields and houses.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s sons and daughters.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s own flesh.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s own life.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s own flesh, skin, bones, marrow, head, hands, feet, eyes, ears, nose, and tongue.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s own happiness.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s own roots of virtue.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s own roots of virtue from the past, future, and present.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s own roots of virtue from the time of one’s original resolve up to the seat of awakening.🔽One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s own roots of virtue from the time of one’s original intent up to the attainment of omniscience.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya'o //🔽de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya'o //🔽de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na /
translated: One should not be unhappy when giving away one’s own roots of virtue from the time of one’s original intent up to the attainment of the Dharma of nonregression.🔽One should

original: de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the self is utterly nonexistent.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o //
translated: Thus, bodhisattva great beings should not grasp at self.

original: de la ji ltar na sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na /
translated: “How should they not grasp at sentient beings, life-force, or person?

original: de ni 'di ltar de dag shin tu med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar de dag shin tu med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because those are utterly nonexistent.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o //
translated: Thus, bodhisattva great beings should not grasp at sentient beings, life-force, or person.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na /
translated: “How should bodhisattva great beings not grasp at nihilism?

original: de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir /
translated: Because all phenomena are utterly unborn.

original: chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because no phenomenon is annihilated.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya'o //
translated: Thus, bodhisattva great beings should not grasp at nihilism.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s not grasping at permanence?

original: de ni 'di ltar chos gang la skye ba @359a *//🔽med pa de la /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar chos gang la skye ba @359a *// med pa de la /
translated: It is the non-arising of any dharma.

original: rtag pa dang chad pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rtag pa dang chad pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because there is neither permanence nor annihilation.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya'o //
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not grasp at permanence.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s not grasping at signs?

original: de ni 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu med pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is the complete absence of affliction.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya'o //
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not grasp at signs.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur blta bar mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur blta bar mi bya zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s not viewing as a cause?

original: de ni 'di ltar lta ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar lta ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te /
translated: It is not seeing that view.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur blta bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur blta bar mi bya'o //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should not view causes.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na /
translated: “In this regard, how should the bodhisattva mahāsattva not become attached to name-and-form?

original: de ni 'di ltar des de'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar des de'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te /
translated: It is because he does not see the reality of that.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya'o //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should not become attached to name-and-form.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na /
translated: “In this regard, how should the bodhisattva mahāsattva not become attached to the aggregates, the sense spheres, and the elements?

original: de ni 'di ltar chos de dag shin tu med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar chos de dag shin tu med pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is because those phenomena do not exist at all.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phung po dang / @359b skye mched dang / khams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phung po dang / @359b skye mched dang / khams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should not become attached to the aggregates, the sense spheres, and the elements.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na /
translated: “How should bodhisattva great beings not be attached to the three realms?

original: de ni 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is because they are essentially nonexistent.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
translated: Thus, bodhisattva great beings

original: khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya'o //
analyzed: khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya'o //
translated: should not be attached to the three realms.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya zhe na /
translated: “How should bodhisattva great beings not cling to the three realms?

original: de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te /🔽de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //
translated: It is because they are unreal and cannot be apprehended.🔽Thus, bodhisattva great beings should not cling to the three realms.🔽“How should bodhisattva great beings not rely on the three realms?

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten pa dang gnas par mi bya zhe na; de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten pa dang gnas par mi bya zhe na; de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is because they are essentially nonexistent.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten pa dang gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten pa dang gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should not rely on or abide in the three realms.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na /
translated: “How should the bodhisattva mahāsattva not become attached to the view that relies on the Buddha?

original: de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten pas /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten pas /
translated: It is because by relying on the view of the Buddha,

original: sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: the Buddha is not seen.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o //🔽de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems @360a *//
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o // de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems @360a *//
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should not become attached to the view that relies on the Buddha.

original: dpa' chen pos chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: dpa' chen pos chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na /
translated: “How should the bodhisattva mahāsattva not become attached to the view that relies on the Dharma?

original: de ni 'di ltar chos su lta ba la brten pas /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar chos su lta ba la brten pas /
translated: It is because by relying on the view of the Dharma,

original: chos mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: chos mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: the Dharma is not seen.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should not become attached to the view that is based on the Dharma.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattva mahāsattva’s non-attachment to the view that is based on the Saṅgha consist in?

original: de ni 'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la brten pas /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la brten pas /
translated: It is the view that the Saṅgha is based on the Dharma.🔽Because, based on the view that the Saṅgha is based on the Dharma,

original: dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: the Saṅgha is not seen.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should not become attached to the view that is based on the Saṅgha.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattva mahāsattva’s non-attachment to the view that is based on discipline consist in?

original: de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la brten pas /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la brten pas /
translated: It is the view that discipline is based on the Dharma.🔽Because, based on the view that discipline is based on the Dharma,

original: tshul khrims rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: tshul khrims rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: discipline is not purified.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should not settle down on the view that is based on morality.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya zhe na /
translated: “How should the bodhisattva mahāsattva not be disheartened by the emptiness of all phenomena?

original: de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that all phenomena are empty because of emptiness.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i @360b phyir te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i @360b phyir te /
translated: It is because of their own characteristics that they are empty.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya'o //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should not be disheartened by the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya zhe na /
translated: “How should the bodhisattva mahāsattva not contradict emptiness?

original: de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa bas /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa bas /
translated: It is because all phenomena are empty.

original: stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Emptiness does not contradict emptiness.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should not contradict emptiness.

original: de lta ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: “How should the bodhisattva mahāsattva perfect emptiness?”

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ni /
translated: The perfection of the emptiness of defining characteristics

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: is the bodhisattva mahāsattva’s perfection of emptiness.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: “How should the bodhisattva mahāsattva actualize the signless?”

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: because all signs are not attended to,

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba'o //
translated: this is the bodhisattva mahāsattva’s actualization of the signless.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: “How should the bodhisattva mahāsattva know wishlessness?”

original: de ni khams gsum thams cad du sems mi 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: de ni khams gsum thams cad du sems mi 'jug pa ste /
translated: It is the mind not entering into all the three realms.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s knowledge of wishlessness.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and mahāsattvas’ purification of the three spheres consist in?

original: dge @361a *// ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: dge @361a *// ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
translated: It is the completion of the ten virtuous actions.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattvas’ and mahāsattvas’ purification of the three spheres.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ and mahāsattvas’ completion of compassion and love for all beings consist in?

original: snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa ste /
translated: It is the attainment of great compassion.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: In this way, bodhisattva-mahāsattvas complete their compassion and love for all beings.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s not despising any sentient being?”

original: byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is the complete perfection of love.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya'o //
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not despise any sentient being.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s view of the sameness of all phenomena?”

original: chos thams cad la bsnan pa dang / dbri ba med pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad la bsnan pa dang / dbri ba med pa ste /
translated: It is the absence of addition or subtraction in all phenomena.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta bas so //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta bas so //
translated: That is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s view of the sameness of all phenomena.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s realization of the correct method?”

original: chos thams cad tshul gcig tu rtogs kyang /
analyzed: chos thams cad tshul gcig tu rtogs kyang /
translated: It is the realization of all phenomena as a single method.

original: rtogs pa med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag @361b ba'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag @361b ba'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ realization of the authentic way.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba la bzod pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba la bzod pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva great beings’ patience with nonproduction?

original: chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bzod pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bzod pa ste /
translated: It is patience with all dharmas being nonproduced, unceasing, and not occasioning anything.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba la bzod pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba la bzod pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ patience with nonproduction.🔽“What is the bodhisattva great beings’ knowledge of nonproduction?

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na; ming dang gzugs mi skye ba shes pa ste /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na; ming dang gzugs mi skye ba shes pa ste /
translated: It is the knowledge that name-and-form is nonproduced.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ knowledge of nonproduction.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva great beings’ teaching of all dharmas as one principle?

original: gnyis la yongs su rgyu ba med pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis la yongs su rgyu ba med pa ste /
translated: It is not moving in the two.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s teaching of all dharmas as one principle.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s dispelling of conceptualization?

original: chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
translated: It is the absence of conceptualization about all dharmas.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s dispelling of conceptualization.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s turning away from views?

original: nyan thos kyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis rnam par spong ba ste /
analyzed: nyan thos kyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis rnam par spong ba ste /
translated: It is the rejection of the views of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s turning away from views.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa gang @362a *//
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa gang @362a *//
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s turning away from the afflictions?

original: zhe na; bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa ste /
analyzed: zhe na; bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa ste /
translated: It is the exhaustion of all the afflictions that are connected to traces.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s reversal of the afflictions.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s level of śamatha and vipaśyanā?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
translated: the wisdom of omniscience.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s level of śamatha and vipaśyanā.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s disciplined mind?

original: khams gsum la dga' bar sems pa med pa ste /
analyzed: khams gsum la dga' bar sems pa med pa ste /
translated: It is the absence of delight in the three realms.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems so //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems so //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s disciplined mind.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s peaceful mind?

original: dbang po drug yang dag par 'dus pa ste /
analyzed: dbang po drug yang dag par 'dus pa ste /
translated: It is the correct gathering of the six senses.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems so //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems so //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s peaceful mind.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s unobstructed wisdom?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa ste /
translated: attaining the buddha eye.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s unobstructed wisdom.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s knowledge of the occasion of love?

original: skye mched drug gi btang snyoms te /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi btang snyoms te /
translated: It is the equanimity of the six sense bases.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s knowledge of the occasion of love.

original: de la @362b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la @362b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s going to any buddhafield that one wishes?

original: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu lus ston pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu lus ston pa ste /
translated: It is manifesting a body in this and that assembly.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s going to the buddhafield of his choice.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s understanding of the minds of all beings?

original: sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rab tu shes pa'o //
analyzed: sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rab tu shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge of the minds and mental factors of all beings with a single mind.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s playfulness with the higher knowledges?

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par rtse zhing /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par rtse zhing /
translated: It is playing with the higher knowledges

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas blta ba'i don du 'gro yang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas blta ba'i don du 'gro yang /
translated: and going from buddhafield to buddhafield in order to see the buddhas,

original: de la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: but not having the notion of a buddha.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s playfulness with the higher knowledges.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ vision of the buddhafields consist in?

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na 'dug cing dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong yang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na 'dug cing dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong yang /
translated: While remaining in one buddhafield, they see infinite buddhafields.

original: de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Yet they do not conceive of them as buddhafields.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta ba'o /
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta ba'o /
translated: This is the bodhisattvas’ vision of the buddhafields.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na /🔽stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi @363a *//
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi @363a *//
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ accomplishment of the buddhafields as they have seen them consist in?

original: dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas te /
analyzed: dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas te /
translated: They remain in the state of a universal monarch who rules over the trichiliocosm.

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gtong zhing /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gtong zhing /
translated: They give away the entire trichiliocosm

original: des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste /
translated: and yet they do not become conceited.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du bsgrub pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s accomplishment of the buddha-land as it is seen.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s serving the buddhas?

original: sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du chos la bsnyen bkur ba ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du chos la bsnyen bkur ba ste /
translated: It is serving the Dharma for the sake of benefiting all sentient beings.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s serving the buddhas.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s correct contemplation of the body of the Tathāgata?

original: chos kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed pa ste /
translated: It is the correct realization of the Dharma body.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s correct contemplation of the body of the Tathāgata.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa gang zhe na; stobs bcu la gnas shing /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa gang zhe na; stobs bcu la gnas shing /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s purification of a buddhafield?🔽It is the purification of the minds of all beings.🔽“What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s knowledge of the absorptions, liberations, samādhis, and samāpattis?

original: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa ste /
translated: It is the knowledge of the absorptions, liberations, samādhis, and samāpattis of all beings.🔽“What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s knowledge of the superior and the middling faculties?🔽It is the knowledge of the faculties of all beings, based on the ten powers.🔽“What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s knowledge of the higher and the lower faculties?🔽It is the knowledge of the faculties of all beings, based on the ten powers.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa'o //
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s knowledge of the superior and the middling faculties?🔽It is the knowledge of the faculties of all beings, based on the ten powers.🔽“What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s knowledge of the higher and the lower faculties?🔽It is the knowledge of the faculties of all beings, based on the ten powers.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s knowledge of the superior and the middling faculties?

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs @363b su sbyong ba ste /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs @363b su sbyong ba ste /
translated: It is the knowledge of the faculties of all beings, based on the ten powers.🔽“What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s knowledge of the higher and the lower faculties?🔽It is the knowledge of the faculties of all beings, based on the ten powers.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'o //
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s knowledge of the superior and the middling faculties?🔽It is the knowledge of the faculties of all beings, based on the ten powers.🔽“What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s knowledge of the higher and the lower faculties?🔽It is the knowledge of the faculties of all beings, based on the ten powers.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s knowledge of the superior and the middling faculties?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bya ba thams cad byed kyang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bya ba thams cad byed kyang /
translated: and to perform all the activities of a bodhisattva-mahāsattva,

original: de'i sems chos gang la'ang mi 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: de'i sems chos gang la'ang mi 'jug pa ste /
translated: but his mind does not engage with any phenomenon.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s samādhi that is like an illusion.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par bzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par bzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s repeated meditative concentration?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: It is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s samādhi that arises from ripening.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par bzhag pa'o //🔽de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa /
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par bzhag pa'o // de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa /
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s repeated meditative concentration.🔽“What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s body that is in accordance with whatever he wishes?

original: de lta de ltar lus yongs su grub pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta de ltar lus yongs su grub pa yin zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s body that is in accordance with whatever he wishes?

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams ji lta ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams ji lta ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba /
translated: Here, bodhisattva mahāsattvas, in whatever way they bring beings to maturity,

original: de lta de ltar ched du bsams shing /
analyzed: de lta de ltar ched du bsams shing /
translated: in that way they intentionally

original: lus yongs su 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: lus yongs su 'dzin pa ste /
translated: take up a body.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba /
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba /
translated: This is the bodhisattva mahāsattvas’ root of merit

original: ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su grub pa'o //🔽de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ched du @364a *//
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su grub pa'o // de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ched du @364a *//
translated: that is in accordance with the accomplishment of the bodies of beings.

original: bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that bodhisattva mahāsattvas intentionally take up existence?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: in order to bring beings to maturity.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva mahāsattvas’ intentional taking up of existence.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba yin zhe na; de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs🔽pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba yin zhe na; de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is the perfection of the six perfections.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: That is the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas’ attainment of the perfection of whatever they wish for.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes par bya ba khong du chud par bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes par bya ba khong du chud par bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s understanding of the languages of devas, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, and mahoragas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: des pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa ste /
analyzed: des pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa ste /
translated: understanding through the knowledge of the language of the wise.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi skad shes par bya ba khong du chud pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi skad shes par bya ba khong du chud pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s understanding of the languages of all beings.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa yin zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s understanding of the teaching through complete eloquence?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: spobs pa so so'i yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa ste /
analyzed: spobs pa so so'i yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa ste /
translated: understanding through the correct knowledge of eloquence.

original: de ni byang chub sems @364b dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs bas nges par bstan pa shes bar bya ba rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems @364b dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs bas nges par bstan pa shes bar bya ba rtogs pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s understanding of the teaching through complete eloquence.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s perfection of entering the mother’s womb?

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe rabs thams cad du brdzus shing skye ba ste /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe rabs thams cad du brdzus shing skye ba ste /
translated: Here the bodhisattva-mahāsattva is born miraculously in all his lives.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s perfection of going to his mother’s womb.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na /
