translated: Subhūti, it is because the intrinsic nature of the result of stream enterer is empty of the intrinsic nature of the result of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, and the result of arhat is empty of the intrinsic nature of the result of arhat.🔽The intrinsic nature of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is empty of the intrinsic nature of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro; ;rab 'byor /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro; ;rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is like this:

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: The knowledge of path aspects is neither existent nor nonexistent.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //🔽rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no // rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is neither existent nor nonexistent.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, the Great Vehicle is also like that: it is neither existent nor nonexistent.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa @383a *//
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa @383a *//
translated: Why is that?

original: nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: Subhūti, the intrinsic nature of the knowledge of path aspects is not existent or nonexistent.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi ngas pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi ngas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the knowledge of all aspects is not existent or nonexistent.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; rab 'byor /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; rab 'byor /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the intrinsic nature of the knowledge of path aspects is empty of the intrinsic nature of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reality of the knowledge of all aspects is empty of the reality of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / ming ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste / dper na / ming ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //🔽rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no // rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: a name is neither existent nor nonexistent.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, that Great Vehicle is neither existent nor nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / mtshan ma dang / brda dang / tha snyad dang / gdags pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no; ;rab 'byor /🔽de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: dper na / mtshan ma dang / brda dang / tha snyad dang / gdags pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin / mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no; ;rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: a sign, a convention, a designation, and a label are neither existent nor nonexistent.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, that Great Vehicle is neither existent nor nonexistent.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / ming gi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / ming gi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: Subhūti, the intrinsic nature of a name is neither existent nor nonexistent.

original: mtshan ma dang / brda dang / tha snyad dang / gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: mtshan ma dang / brda dang / tha snyad dang / gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic identity of signs, conventional symbols, conventions, and designations is neither abiding nor non-abiding.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / ming gi ngo bo nyid ming gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / ming gi ngo bo nyid ming gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, the intrinsic identity of a name is empty of the intrinsic identity of a name.

original: mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //🔽brda'i ngo bo nyid brda'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro // brda'i ngo bo nyid brda'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The intrinsic identity of a sign is empty of the intrinsic identity of a sign.

original: tha snyad kyi ngo bo nyid tha snyad kyi ngo bo @383b nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad kyi ngo bo nyid tha snyad kyi ngo bo @383b nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The intrinsic identity of a conventional symbol is empty of the intrinsic identity of a conventional symbol.🔽The intrinsic identity of a convention is empty of the intrinsic identity of a convention.

original: gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The intrinsic identity of a designation is empty of the intrinsic identity of a designation.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / skye ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste / dper na / skye ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: non-production is neither abiding nor non-abiding.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, the Great Vehicle is also neither abiding nor non-abiding.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //🔽rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: dper na / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin / mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no // rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: For example, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification are neither abiding nor non-abiding.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, that Great Vehicle is neither abiding nor non-abiding.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: Subhūti, in the intrinsic nature of non-production there is no abiding or non-abiding.

original: 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: In the intrinsic nature of non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification there is no abiding or non-abiding.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the intrinsic nature of non-production is empty of the intrinsic nature of non-production.

original: 'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid 'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //🔽kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid 'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro // kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the non-ceased nature is empty of the non-ceased nature.🔽because the uncontaminated nature is empty of the uncontaminated nature.

original: rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the unpurified nature is empty of the unpurified nature.

original: rang 'byor / 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rang 'byor / 'di lta ste / dper na / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: For example, Subhūti,

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //🔽rab @384a *// 'byor; de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no // rab @384a *// 'byor; de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: non-conditioning is neither abiding nor non-abiding.🔽Subhūti,

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: in the same way, that Great Vehicle is neither abiding nor non-abiding.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: Subhūti, in the nature of non-conditioning there is no abiding or non-abiding.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the non-production of the perfection of wisdom is empty of the non-production of the perfection of wisdom, and so on up to the non-production of the knowledge of all aspects is empty of the non-production of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po de ni mi gnas par gnas pa'i tshul dang / bskyod du med pa'i tshul gyis gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po de ni mi gnas par gnas pa'i tshul dang / bskyod du med pa'i tshul gyis gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: Subhūti, for these reasons the Great Vehicle does not stand anywhere, in the manner of not standing, and in the manner of not moving.

original: rab 'byor / gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa des su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa des su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni /
translated: “Subhūti, you asked, ‘Who will appear in that vehicle?’

original: theg pa des su'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: theg pa des su'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do //
translated: No one at all will appear in that vehicle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; rab 'byor /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; rab 'byor /
translated: And why?

original: de ni 'di ltar theg pa de gang yin pa dang / gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar theg pa de gang yin pa dang / gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Subhūti, it is because all those dharmas—that vehicle, that which would appear, that by which it would appear, and that from which it would appear—are non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs na /
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs na /
translated: If all dharmas are non-existent and not apprehended,

original: chos gang zhig chos gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: chos gang zhig chos gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: what dharma would arise through what dharma?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is it so?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self is utterly pure, and sentient beings, living beings, souls, persons, human beings, humankind, those who live, those who feel, knowers,

original: tshor @384b ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshor @384b ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: seers are utterly pure.

original: mtha' las 'das pas bdag dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas bdag dmigs su med do //
translated: The self is not apprehended because it is beyond extremes.

original: mtha' las 'das pas sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pas sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang /
translated: Sentient beings, living beings, souls, persons, human beings, humankind, those who live, those who feel, knowers,

original: mthong pa po dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mthong pa po dmigs su med do //
translated: seers are not apprehended because they are beyond extremes.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of utter purity.

original: chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do //
translated: The expanse of reality is non-apprehensible.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the utter purity of the expanse of reality.

original: de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med do //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med do //
translated: Suchness, the very limit of reality, and the inconceivable expanse are non-apprehensible.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the utter purity of suchness, the very limit of reality, and the inconceivable expanse.

original: phung po rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: phung po rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The aggregates are non-apprehensible.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the utter purity of the aggregates.

original: skye mched dang / khams rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The sense spheres and the elements are non-apprehensible.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the utter purity of the sense spheres and the elements.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su med do //
translated: Dependent origination is non-apprehensible.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the utter purity of dependent origination.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The perfection of generosity is non-apprehensible.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the utter purity of the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang; bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang; bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //
translated: the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom cannot be apprehended.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of perfect purity,

original: nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena cannot be apprehended.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of perfect purity,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med do //
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature cannot be apprehended.

original: shin tu rnam par dag @385a *//
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag @385a *//
translated: Because of perfect purity,

original: pa'i phyir / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: pa'i phyir / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: the applications of mindfulness cannot be apprehended.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of perfect purity,

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med do //
translated: the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and the eightfold noble path cannot be apprehended.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The four noble truths,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: signlessness, and aspirationlessness, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways are non-apprehensible, because they are utterly pure.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med do; ;shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med do; ;shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible, because they are utterly pure.🔽The stream enterer is non-apprehensible,🔽The once-returner is non-apprehensible,

translated: the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-apprehension.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: “Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis /
analyzed: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis /
translated: with respect to all phenomena that are non-apprehensible

original: theg pa chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: theg pa chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will emerge in the Great Vehicle to omniscience.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bcu pa'o ////🔽@390a *// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bcu pa'o //// @390a *// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: This concludes the tenth chapter, on the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽theg pa chen po /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / theg pa chen po /
translated: “Lord,🔽the Great Vehicle,

original: theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ni /
analyzed: theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ni /
translated: the Great Vehicle—

original: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur bas /
analyzed: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur bas /
translated: it surpasses the world with its gods, humans, and asuras and goes forth.

original: de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o //
analyzed: de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o //
translated: That is why it is called the Great Vehicle.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste; ji ltar nam mkha'i sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di'ang sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pas /
analyzed: theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste; ji ltar nam mkha'i sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di'ang sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pas /
translated: that vehicle is equal to space, for just as space provides room for countless, innumerable sentient beings, so too this Great Vehicle provides room for countless, innumerable sentient beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for that reason

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po ste /
translated: It is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: theg pa chen po de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'am /
analyzed: theg pa chen po de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'am /
translated: In that Great Vehicle, there is no coming or going,

original: gnas pa'ang ma mchis /
analyzed: gnas pa'ang ma mchis /
translated: no abiding,

original: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus zhes bgyi ba'ang ma mchis so //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus zhes bgyi ba'ang ma mchis so //
translated: and no past, future, or present.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'ang ma mchis la; gnas pa'ang ma mchis pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'ang ma mchis la; gnas pa'ang ma mchis pa de bzhin du /
translated: just as there is no coming or going in space, and no abiding,

original: theg pa chen po 'di la'ang 'gro ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: theg pa chen po 'di la'ang 'gro ba mi dmigs /
translated: in this Great Vehicle, going is not observed,

original: 'ong ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: 'ong ba mi dmigs /
translated: coming is not observed,

original: gnas pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gnas pa mi dmigs so //
translated: and abiding is not observed.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:🔽just as space is not observed in the three times

original: dper na / nam mkha' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du /
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du /
translated: because it is the equality of the three times,

original: sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: and just as the past is not observed,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: the future is not observed,

original: dbus mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs so //
translated: and the present is not observed,🔽in the same way, this Great Vehicle is not observed in the three times

original: de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di'ang dus gsum @390b mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du /
analyzed: de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di'ang dus gsum @390b mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du /
translated: because it is the equality of the three times.

original: sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: The past limit is not apprehended.

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: The future limit is not apprehended.

original: dbus mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs so //
translated: The middle is not apprehended.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: theg pa chen po 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa pas /
analyzed: theg pa chen po 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa pas /
translated: This Great Vehicle is the vehicle of the sameness of the three times.

original: de'i slad du theg pa chen po /
analyzed: de'i slad du theg pa chen po /
translated: For that reason, it is called the Great Vehicle.

original: theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o //
translated: It is called the Great Vehicle.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just so!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag ni /
translated: These six perfections

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste /
translated: are the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: They are the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva’s Great Vehicle.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, the Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva’s Great Vehicle is

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: as follows:

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways and all the samādhi gateways.

original: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas /
analyzed: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas /
translated: It is the Heroic Progress Samādhi, the Space-like Samādhi,

original: rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du ste /
analyzed: rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du ste /
translated: up to the Unbound and Uncovered Liberation Samādhi.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva’s Great Vehicle.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, the Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva’s Great Vehicle is

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: as follows:

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar @391a *//
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar @391a *//
translated: it is the emptiness of internal phenomena, up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: du ste; 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: du ste; 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: This is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni; 'di lta ste /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni; 'di lta ste / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is as follows:🔽the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of magical power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven parts of awakening, the eightfold noble path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /🔽snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste /
translated: the signless,🔽the wishless,🔽the superknowledges,🔽the meditative stabilizations,🔽the dhāraṇī gateways,🔽the ten powers of the tathāgatas,🔽the four fearlessnesses,🔽the four detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽great compassion,🔽and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽
